casebody.data:
Ricky BUSICK, Individually; and Judy Busick, Individually and as the Wife of Ricky Busick, Appellants,
v.
Timothy James TRAINOR, M.D., Individually; Yee Advanced Orthopedics and Sports Medicine, P.C., a Nevada Professional Corporation, d/b/a Advanced Orthopedics and Sports Medicine, Respondents. No. 72966 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MARCH 28, 2019

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED IN PART. REMAND.
